title: State v. Chester Hollman III – Addendum 2 – Prosecutable Offenses
content:encoded:
February 15, 2018 / Addendum host Jon Cryer, along with Colin Miller and guest panelist Kandice Horsey talk about the criminal justice system in Philly as well as the Hollman case. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
